simplesect.title: uint8_t NVIC_IRQChannel
simplesect.para: Specifies the IRQ channel to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be an enumerator of IRQn_Type enumeration (For the complete STM32 Devices IRQ Channels list, please refer to stm32f4xx.h file)

simplesect.title: uint8_t NVIC_IRQChannelPreemptionPriority
simplesect.para: Specifies the pre-emption priority for the IRQ channel specified in NVIC_IRQChannel. This parameter can be a value between 0 and 15 as described in the table MISC_NVIC_Priority_Table A lower priority value indicates a higher priority

simplesect.para: Specifies the subpriority level for the IRQ channel specified in NVIC_IRQChannel. This parameter can be a value between 0 and 15 as described in the table MISC_NVIC_Priority_Table A lower priority value indicates a higher priority
